text: If the excel has two sheet:sheet1 and sheet2,and there is a picture in sheet1. If a new picture is inserted,the new picture can not been shown when it is inserted into sheet2.But we can know that the picture has been inserted into the excel because the excel's size becomes larger.
creator: abcwzh@126.com

text:
Please try with the latest build form trunk. A link to daily builds is on http://poi.apache.org/

If the problem is still present, please re-open this bug and upload sample .xls file and Java code that demonstrates the problem. 

Yegor
creator: yegor@dinom.ru

text: Resolving as fixed as no response was given for a long time, please reopen this issue with more information/samples/reproducer-code if this is still a problem for you.
